verbose_text: 7 Creatine phosphate sodium can reserve energy in the myocardium, skeletal muscle, and brain for the resynthesis of ATP, reduce myocardial ischaemia and reperfusion injury, improve heart function, decrease the incidence of coronary heart disease, and protect the brain in the elderly.
evidence: Creatine phosphate sodium can reserve energy in the myocardium, skeletal muscle, and brain for the resynthesis of ATP, reduce myocardial ischaemia and reperfusion injury
